name: BigQuery Export Limit
description: There is a limit on the BigQuery Export. If the daily export exceed 1 million events, it is paused. Learn more in the documentation on BigQuery Export. The limit is substantially higher for the 360 properties (more information can be found in the official documentation.

constants.name: dailyExportLimit
constants.description: Daily limit for BigQuery Export for free GA properties

blocks.passMessage: Estimated daily hits within export the limit of ${(dailyExportLimit/1000000).toFixed(2)} million hits daily.
blocks.failMessage: The estimated daily hits in UA property exceed the limit of ${(dailyExportLimit/1000000).toFixed(2)} million hits daily.
blocks.failHowtofix: The export to BigQuery can be filtered by the event name. Check the following table to decide about the export setting.
